pages: Rules on Selection, Conditions of Service, Wages and Other Benefits of the Chief Executive Officer of the Deposit and Loan Guarantee Fund, 1973Nepal Official Gazette dated 2075 / 03 / 39Article 65 of the Deposit and Loan Guarantee Fund Act, 1973Government of Nepal has made rules on assistance.(1) The name of these rules is "Rules on Selection, Conditions of Service, Wages and Other Benefits of the Chief Executive Officer of the Deposit and Loan Guarantee Fund and Beginning of the Chief Executive Officer of the Deposit and Loan Guarantee Fund," 20 75(2) This Rules will commence immediately Definition: In this Rules, if the subject or context does not have any other meaning,2"Yes" means the Deposit and Loan Guarantee Fund Act, 1973Remember)"The Chief Executive Officer shall be regarded as the accredited Chief Executive Officer appointed pursuant to paragraph 49 of the Act"The Standing Committee shall be regarded as the Standing Committee constituted pursuant to paragraph (2) of paragraph 49 of the Act to recommend the appointment of the Chief Executive Officer.The Standing Committee shall be regarded as the Standing Committee of the Chief Executive Officer.The Standing Committee of the Chief Executive Officer shall be regarded as the Standing Committee of the Chief Executive Officer appointed pursuant to paragraph (2) of paragraph 49 of the Act.The Standing Committee of the Chief Executive Officer shall be regarded as the Standing Committee of the Chief Executive Officer appointed pursuant to paragraph (2) of paragraph (2) of the Act.The Standing Committee of the Chief Executive Officer shall be regarded as the Standing Committee of the Chief Executive Officer appointed pursuant to paragraph (2) of paragraph (2) of the Act.

If three less requests are received within the period referred to in (d) concerning the commercial and financial operations of the funds prepared by the Selection Committee in the specified framework, then it will be necessary to republish the notice of seven days in accordance with (d) sub-rule (1) of this Regulation.In the next three days, in accordance with (d) sub-rule (1) of this Regulation, the Selection Committee will be required to provide the candidates concerned with the dates for the presentation of the Commercial and Financial Operations Plan submitted pursuant to sub-rule (2) of the Selection Committee. g (7) On the basis of sub-rule (5) of the Selection Committee, the names of the three candidates with the highest number of points received by each candidate shall be recommended to the Ministry of Nepal before the Government of Nepal. (8) The criteria and other procedures adopted by the Selection Committee in respect of the candidate selection shall be as determined by the Selection Committee itself.
